name: Roasted Salt & Vinegar Chickpeas
author: France C
summary: If you love salt and vinegar chips like I do, you will love this healthier alternative! This tangy and salty treat will keep you coming back for more! Perfect as a midday snack. Keep an eye on these, as they can easily burn.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
directions: Combine chickpeas and vinegar in a saucepan
Remove from heat and let stand for 30 minutes
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a roasting pan with foil
Spread on the roasting pan and drizzle with olive oil
Sprinkle salt on top and toss to coat
Roast chickpeas, shaking the pan every 8 to 10 minutes, until they are slightly soft on the inside and crunchy on the outside, about 30 minutes
Transfer to a plate lined with paper towels to absorb excess oil
Serve warm or at room temperature
